title: FastRLAP: A System for Learning High-Speed Driving via Deep RL and Autonomous Practicing. (arXiv:2304.09831v1 [cs.RO])
abstract: We present a system that enables an autonomous small-scale RC car to drive aggressively from visual observations using reinforcement learning (RL). Our system, FastRLAP (faster lap), trains autonomously in the real world, without human interventions, and without requiring any simulation or expert demonstrations. Our system integrates a number of important components to make this possible: we initialize the representations for the RL policy and value function from a large prior dataset of other robots navigating in other environments (at low speed), which provides a navigation-relevant representation. From here, a sample-efficient online RL method uses a single low-speed user-provided demonstration to determine the desired driving course, extracts a set of navigational checkpoints, and autonomously practices driving through these checkpoints, resetting automatically on collision or failure. Perhaps surprisingly, we find that with appropriate initialization and choice of algorithm, our s

Title: FastRLAP: A System for Learning High-Speed Driving via Deep RL and Autonomous Practicing. (arXiv:2304.09831v1 [cs.RO])
Abstract: We present a system that enables an autonomous small-scale RC car to drive aggressively from visual observations using reinforcement learning (RL). Our system, FastRLAP (faster lap), trains autonomously in the real world, without human interventions, and without requiring any simulation or expert demonstrations. Our system integrates a number of important components to make this possible: we initialize the representations for the RL policy and value function from a large prior dataset of other robots navigating in other environments (at low speed), which provides a navigation-relevant representation. From here, a sample-efficient online RL method uses a single low-speed user-provided demonstration to determine the desired driving course, extracts a set of navigational checkpoints, and autonomously practices driving through these checkpoints, resetting automatically on collision or failure. tldr: FastRLAP是一个RL系统，可以实现小型自主驾驶车辆的高速驾驶训练，无需人为干预和任何模拟或专家演示。其使用大量先验数据集来初始化策略和价值函数表示，而不是直接从零开始学习，实现了样本高效的在线RL训练方法。
